headline.main: U.S. Report on Smoking Seeks A Ban on High-Tar Cigarettes

docs.abstract: Ford Adm asks Cong for power to ban high-tar and high-nicotine cigarettes (S)

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 30 (AP) The Ford Administration, submitting the ninth Government report on smoking and health to Congress, has asked for the power to ban high-tar and high-nicotine cigarettes.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 30 (AP) The Ford Administration,  submitting the ninth Government report on smoking and health to Congress, has asked for the power to ban high-tar and high-nicotine cigarettes.
